days.title: Legs, Calves And Abs
days.cardio: For cardio, we start easy this week. You'll perform 15 minutes of steady-state cardio each day. On most days, you'll perform your steady-state cardio upon waking. But today I want you to perform your cardio immediately after you finish your legs and abs workout. That's because it will help you burn out lactic acid and recover better.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Machine squats
exercises.rest: Rest 3 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Leg presses
exercises.rest: Rest 3 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Lying hamstrings curls
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Standing calves raises
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Elevated sit-ups
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Lying leg raises
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between each set

days.title: Back
days.cardio: Today you'll perform your 15 minutes of steady-state cardio upon rising. You can take in CLEAN BURN®, AMINO SYNERGY, and GLUTAMINE before or during your session, but make sure you avoid eating a meal. Amino Synergy will supply amino acids to help protect your muscles, and not having carbohydrates from a full meal will encourage your body to burn fat to fuel this activity. I'll be making adjustments to your cardio throughout this Trainer series, but you'll perform just 15 minutes during the first week on my 12-Week Lean Muscle Program.

exercises.name: High machine lat pulldowns
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Reverse-grip lat pulldowns
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Reverse-grip bent-over barbell rows
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Cable rows
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Dumbbell deadlifts
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes and stretch between each set

days.title: Chest And Abs
days.cardio: Don't forget to begin your day with 15 minutes of steady-state cardio. If you didn't perform this upon waking, then you can finish your day with it. The last will help boost metabolism to keep burning body fat while you sleep.

exercises.name: Incline chest presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between sets

exercises.name: Incline dumbbell flyes
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between sets

exercises.name: Dumbbell chest presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between sets

exercises.name: Decline cable flyes
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between sets

exercises.name: Pushups
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between each set

exercises.name: Bicycle crunches
exercises.reps: Rest 30-40 seconds before the next move

exercises.name: Variation: Side plank thread the needle

days.title: Shoulders And Calves
days.cardio: Note that you'll also perform steady-state cardio upon waking today-only 15 minutes during the first week of this program. We'll eventually increase the duration and intensity of your cardio on this 12-Week Lean Muscle Program . Finally, you'll take a break from abs today. With that background in mind, let's get started:

exercises.name: Seated lateral raises
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between sets

exercises.name: Rear-delt Pec-deck flyes
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between sets

exercises.name: Dumbbell shoulder presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between sets

exercises.name: Incline rear-delt dumbbell raises
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between sets

exercises.name: Machine shoulder presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds and stretch between each set

exercises.name: Seated calves raises
exercises.reps: Rest 1 minute and stretch between sets

days.title: Arms And Abs
days.cardio: Remember to perform 15 minutes of steady-state cardio upon rising. As we get deeper into this 12-week program I'll provide more suggestions about when and how to perform cardio.

exercises.name: Triceps extensions
exercises.rest: SUPERSET triceps extensions and cable curls, resting 1 minute between each superset

exercises.name: Lying triceps extensions
exercises.rest: 3 Sets/15 Reps
exercises.notes: Circuit Combo Lying Triceps Extensions & Neutral-Grip Barbell Curls. Rest 1-2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Bench dips
exercises.rest: Rest 1-2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Dumbbell curls
exercises.rest: Rest 1-2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Lying leg raises
exercises.rest: SUPERSET lying leg raises and crunches, resting 30-40 seconds between each superset

days.title: Rest Day
days.cardio: Today is your first day of rest from weight training. You'll only perform 15 minutes of cardio, which you can do upon rising. This will help burn out the lactic acid that's collected in your legs muscles throughout your first week on my 12-Week Lean Muscle Program , and it will also support overall recovery. In subsequent weeks I'll be increasing the duration of your cardio, and employing different strategies such as high-intensity interval training (HIIT) that encourage your body to release stored fat. And you'll also perform 2 daily sessions of cardio starting with Day 8 and continuing throughout the rest of my 12-week program.

days.title: Rest Day
days.cardio: Today, you'll perform 15 minutes of steady-state cardio upon waking. As I said yesterday, we're really going to bump up the duration and intensity of cardio as this 12-week program progresses. My tip today is about the advantage of performing some form of exercise every day.

days.title: Legs, Calves And Abs
days.cardio: Remember that you'll be performing 2 sessions of cardio for 20 minutes each day this week. While you'll perform steady-state cardio upon waking every day, I want you to perform your second cardio session on legs day after your workout in the p.m. That's because today's cardio will help you burn out the lactic acid in your legs and reduce soreness. If you train soon after waking, make sure your first cardio is immediately after the workout, not before.

exercises.name: Smith machine squats
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Walking barbell lunges
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Leg presses
exercises.rest: Place feet in a neutral stance, and rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Lying hamstrings curls
exercises.rest: SUPERSET lying hamstrings curls with standing calves presses, resting 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Abs rollouts
exercises.rest: SUPERSET abs rollouts with leg raises, resting 1 minute between supersets

days.title: Back
days.cardio: This is our second back workout on my 12-Week Lean Muscle Program . You'll perform cardio upon waking before you get to the gym, that is if you train later in the day, but if you train early, hit back and then do your first cardio immediately following. That will help transport nutrients to your legs, which should be sore from yesterday's workout. It also gets your blood flowing and supports burning body fat. You'll keep this cardio session to 20 minutes of steady state this week. Then you'll perform another 20-minute session at the end of the day.

exercises.name: Lat pulldowns
exercises.rest: Rest 1-2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Chin ups
exercises.rest: Rest 1-2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Bent-over dumbbell row
exercises.rest: Rest 1-2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Machine deadlifts
exercises.rest: Rest 1-2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Close-grip pulldowns
exercises.rest: Rest 1-2 minutes between sets

days.title: Chest And Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Incline dumbbell presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET incline dumbbell presses with decline dumbbell flyes resting 1-2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Seated machine chest
exercises.rest: Rest 1 minute between sets

exercises.name: Bent-over cable flyes
exercises.rest: Rest 1 minute between sets

exercises.name: Lying crunches
exercises.rest: Perform 20 reps with control and then 20 reps fast

exercises.name: Twisting Crunches
exercises.reps: Perform 20 reps per side with control, then 20 reps per side fast

exercises.name: Sit-Ups
exercises.reps: Perform 20 reps with control and then 20 reps fast

exercises.name: Bicycle crunches
exercises.rest: Perform 10 reps per side

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: You'll begin today with your morning cardio performed upon waking, and then you'll weight-train after consuming at least one meal. You can weight train at any time of day you like. Danielle and Kai trained at 11 a.m. most days depending on their schedules. But you can train before your morning cardio, mid-morning, mid-afternoon, after work, or before bed (as long as your p.m. cardio follows). The key is to choose the time that suits your lifestyle best, and make sure you get in every workout. For instance, if you're training in the morning but you're forced to miss a morning workout, you can easily get it in before bedtime. When you miss the time of day when you typically train you can always make it up later-never allow yourself the excuse that you're "too busy" to work out.

exercises.name: Rear-delts dumbbell raises
exercises.rest: Rest 1 minute between sets

exercises.name: Arnold presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Seated dumbbell lateral raises
exercises.rest: Perform a triple drop with no rest, and then rest 90 seconds between full drop sets

exercises.name: Machine unilateral shoulder presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Bilateral dumbbell front raises
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Barbell upright rows
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

days.title: Arms And Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Triceps pushdowns
exercises.rest: SUPERSET triceps pushdowns with overhead triceps rope extensions, resting 90 seconds between supersets

exercises.name: Close-grip pushups
exercises.rest: SUPERSET close-grip pushups and bench dips, resting 90 seconds between supersets

exercises.name: Cable curls
exercises.rest: SUPERSET cable curls with barbell curls, resting 1-2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Bilateral to unilateral dumbbell biceps curls
exercises.rest: Begin with bilateral, transition to unilateral to failure. Rest 1 minute between sets.

exercises.name: Medicine ball crunches
exercises.rest: SUPERSET of slow-and-hold for 20 reps followed by 10 fast with no hold for medicine ball crunches; then perform 20 reps of regular lying raises followed by 10 reps where you lift your butt off the ground. Rest 2 minutes between these abs supersets.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: While today is an active rest day, you'll still perform cardio twice today. The intensity of the cardio should be enough to make you sweat. Over the upcoming weeks we're going to take up the intensity of cardio quite a bit, using it as an important tool to support shedding body fat. You'll perform your first 20 minutes of cardio upon rising, and then you'll get in another 20-minute session much later in the day. It's crucial that you do not combine these sessions. You want the fat-burning advantage that comes with increasing your metabolism twice each day.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: * Weigh yourself upon rising. Remember that the goals is not to lose weight - although that will happen - but to use your current bodyweight as a metric for shifting your diet, adjusting your cardio, and/or changing up your supplements.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: You'll note that Danielle and Kai talk about the 60 minutes of cardio they performed today at the beginning of the video. I have recommended that you perform a morning session of 25 minutes and an evening session of 35 minutes, both steady-state for this week. The key is to make sure that you split them into sessions separated by several hours to spike metabolism at different times of day.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: 20 reps of leg extensions followed immediately by 20 walking lunges per leg. No rest throughout the entire superset

exercises.name: Machine Squats
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Leg Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Stiff-Legged Dumbbell Deadlifts
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Single-Leg Standing Calves Raises
exercises.rest: Perform 20 reps slowly, and then finish off with 10 fast reps. Then perform the same number of reps for the other leg. No rest between sets

days.title: Back, Traps And Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Reverse-Grip Lat Pulldowns
exercises.rest: SUPERSET You'll perform a set of reverse-grip lat pulldowns followed immediately by bent-over dumbbell rows. Then you'll rest for 2 minutes between supersets.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.rest: SUPERSET You'll perform regular grip lat pulldowns followed immediately by seated cable rows. Then you'll rest 2 minutes between supersets.

exercises.name: Straight-Arm Cable Pulldowns
exercises.rest: SUPERSET Perform a set of straight-arm
exercises.notes: cable pulldowns to target lats followed immediately by a set of dumbbell shrugs to target traps. Then rest 2 minutes before repeating this circuit.

exercises.name: Partner-Assisted Sit-Ups
exercises.rest: SUPERSET Perform as many hanging leg
exercises.notes: raises as you can with straight legs, then go to full failure with the bent-leg version. Follow this immediately with partner assisted sit-ups. Then rest 2 minutes between supersets

days.title: Chest
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Flat Bench Presses
exercises.rest: Performed with a drop set and 90 seconds of rest between each full set

exercises.name: Cable Crossover Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Unilateral Incline Chest Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Pec Deck Flyes
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

days.title: Shoulders And Calves
days.cardio: Don't forget about your cardio-I say this to my clients all the time, but I'm always shocked at how often they neglect to get in 1 of their 2 cardio sessions each day. It's a crucial part of my 12-Week Lean Muscle Program , and I don't want you to underestimate the importance of these cardio sessions.

exercises.name: Barbell Front Raises
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform barbell front raises followed immediately by standing barbell presses using the same weight. Rest 90 seconds between supersets

exercises.name: Standing Dumbbell Lateral-Front Raises
exercises.rest: Each rep includes both a lateral and front raise. Then burn out with lateral raises. Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Reverse Cable Crossovers
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Seated calves raises
exercises.reps: Perform the first 20 reps slow, and then follow with 10 fast reps. Rest 90 seconds between sets

days.title: Arms And Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Barbell Curls
exercises.rest: Perform 3 regular sets followed by 1 double drop set of 10 reps for each of the weights. Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Seated Cable Curls
exercises.rest: Perform 10 reps, and then drop weight and perform another 10 reps. Do this 3 times, resting 90 seconds after completing each drop set

exercises.name: Triceps Cable Pushdowns
exercises.rest: Perform 3 regular sets followed by 1 double drop set of 10 reps for each of the weights. Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Extensions
exercises.rest: Perform 2 regular sets of 20 reps followed by 2 double drop set of 10 reps for each of the weights. Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Bench Dips
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Elevated Sit-Ups
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Reverse Crunches
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: By this point in my 12-Week Lean Muscle Program you should know the drill. You're going to perform 2 sets of steady-state cardio today. That means 25 minutes upon rising, and then another 35 minutes later in the day. Again, intensity should be enough to cause you to sweat. You may think this is a little boring, but cardio is going to get much more intense in the weeks to come. Trust me, you won't be bored when that happens!

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: * Weigh yourself upon rising. Remember that the goal is not to lose weight - although that will happen - but to use your current bodyweight as a metric for shifting your diet, adjusting your cardio, and/or changing up your supplements. At this point, you should be reducing body weight by shedding stored body fat. Use your current bodyweight to recalculate the amount of calories you should consume each day.

days.title: Legs And Calves
days.cardio: Today, I'm introducing high-intensity interval training (HIIT), a type of cardio that has been demonstrated by research to release more fat from storage than typical steady-state cardio performed for the same duration. You'll be performing this form of cardio every day this week in the same quantities. Then, next week will begin to take up the intensity of our HIIT cardio to promote additional fat-burning as the body begins to accommodate.

exercises.name: Lying Hamstrings Curls
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Lying hamstrings curls and walking lunges. No rest between supersets

exercises.name: Smith Machine Squats (Females)
exercises.rest: Sets 1-2: Straight set
exercises.notes: Sets 3-4: Drop set Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Squats (Males)
exercises.rest: Sets 1-2: Straight set
exercises.notes: Sets 3-4: Drop set Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Stiff-Legged Barbell Deadlifts
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Leg Extension
exercises.rest: Each rep to be done as 1 + ½ , resting 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Standing Calves Presses
exercises.rest: First 20 reps to be done slowly; last 10 reps to be done fast. Rest 1 minute between sets

days.title: Back And Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Unilateral Seated Vertical Rows
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Smith Machine Bent-Over Rows
exercises.rest: Perform these as a drop set of 20 reps total and rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Seated Cable Rows
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Neutral-Grip Lat Pulldowns With V-Bar Grip
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Lying Leg Raises
exercises.rest: Once you reach failure perform pulses at the top. Rest 1 minute between sets

exercises.name: Twist Crunches
exercises.rest: When you reach failure perform regular crunches. Rest 1 minute between sets

exercises.name: V-Ups
exercises.rest: Rest 1 minute between sets

exercises.name: Crossover V-Ups
exercises.rest: Rest 1 minute between sets

days.title: Chest
days.cardio: Don't forget to perform your 2 sets of cardio today, including HIIT for 10 minutes in the first session and 15 minutes in the second session as described in the chart.

exercises.name: Bear Crawls
exercises.rest: Take 10 steps forward then 10 steps back, and rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Staggered Pushups
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform decline dumbbell flyes followed immediately by decline dumbbell presses using the same weight. Then rest 90 seconds between supersets

exercises.name: Decline
exercises.rest: 3 Set/Failure

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Remember to get in your HIIT cardio early in the day and later in the day.

exercises.name: Seated rear-delts dumbbell raises
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform seated rear-delts raises followed immediately by front-delts raises. When you can't complete more stand to finish each exercise. Do not rest during the entire superset

exercises.name: Lateral raises
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform a set of lateral raises followed immediately by right-angle lateral raises. Rest 90 seconds between supersets

exercises.name: Alternating Dumbbell Shoulder Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Barbell upright rows
exercises.rest: Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Seated calves raises
exercises.reps: Perform 20 with strict form and complete with 10 fast reps. Rest 90 seconds between sets

days.title: Arms And Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Lying Cable Curls
exercises.rest: Using my DTP technique. Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Barbell Curls
exercises.rest: Using my DTP technique. Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Triceps Cable Pushdowns
exercises.rest: Using my DTP technique. Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Skull Crushers
exercises.rest: Using my DTP technique. Rest 90 seconds between sets

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform as many hanging leg raises as you can to failure, then switch to hanging knee raises without resting. Then rest 90 seconds before performing the next superset

exercises.name: Lying Leg Raises
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform as many lying leg raises as you can to failure, then switch to lying knee ups without resting. Then rest 90 seconds before performing the next superset

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Today, you've earned some time away from the gym unless that's where you perform your cardio. Remember it's okay to perform cardio at home if you don't have a piece of high-tech equipment. You can easily include jogging on the streets, a track or trails in a park, and then you can also perform your HIIT training in the same place. You can even jump rope in your basement or garage. The key thing is to get in your 2 cardio sessions today, split by several hours to boost metabolism.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: This is precisely the result you want to see after about 4 weeks on my 12-week program. Just stay on track with your weight training, cardio, and supplementation. I'll be taking up both the cardio and weight-training intensity next week so you'll naturally be burning more calories, and you'll potentially be adding muscle mass, which also helps burns calories to support fat loss.

days.title: Legs And Calves
days.cardio: Last week was your first week of incorporating HIIT cardio. This week we'll change up the rhythm. You'll still perform 25 minutes of steady state cardio. Then you'll transition into HIIT cardio for an additional 10 minutes during your first cardio session of the day, and then an additional 15 minutes of HIIT cardio in your second session. Now, though, you'll perform 60 second intervals, working as hard as you can for 60 seconds followed by 60 seconds of recovery at the pace that will allow you to go all out again after this relatively short recovery phase. You'll almost think you can feel these HIIT-cardio session melting stored fat! They're very intense.

exercises.name: High Leg Presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: You'll perform high leg presses using DTP followed immediately by 10 steps per leg for walking lunges. Rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Low Leg Presses
exercises.rest: SUPSERSET: You'll perform low leg presses using DTP followed immediately by leg extensions using DTP. Rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Standing Calves Raises
exercises.rest: Perform 20 reps with strict form, and then do 10 more fast. Rest 1 minute between each of these 3 sets

days.title: Back And Abs
days.cardio: You'll perform your first cardio session upon waking, and then a few-or several-hours later you'll train your back and abs today. Take a look at my workout chart to make sure you're getting the right amount and the proper HIIT sessions for each workout.

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Chin-Ups
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Reverse-Grip Lat Pulldowns With EZ-Bar
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Unilateral High Row Machine
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Bent-Over Dumbbell Rows
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Decline Bench Sit-Ups
exercises.rest: Perform 10 reps of opposite elbow to knee; 10 reps of opposite hand to opposite knee; then 10 reps straight up. Rest 1 minute between sets

days.title: Chest
days.cardio: Don't forget to get in your cardio upon rising-and remember that you can switch up the type of cardio you're performing. That also ups the ante on your HIIT-cardio sessions, which you'll now be performing for 60 seconds on and 60 seconds off. Again, after 25 minutes you'll follow this rhythm for 10 minutes in the morning and then for 15 minutes in the evening (or after your workouts).

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform all reps for incline dumbbell flyes followed immediately by decline dumbbell presses, and then rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Decline Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform all reps for decline dumbbell flyes followed immediately by incline dumbbell presses, and then rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Banded Partner Pushups
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

days.title: Shoulders And Calves
days.cardio: And don't forget about your cardio-it's a crucial component of your 12-Week Lean Muscle Program . I really cannot emphasize this enough.

exercises.name: Seated dumbbell shoulder presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform seated shoulder presses followed immediately by standing lateral raises, and then rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Seated Smith machine shoulder presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform seated Smith machine shoulder presses followed immediately by standing plate front raises, and then rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Machine shoulder presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform machine shoulder presses followed immediately by dumbbell rear-delts raises, and then rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Seated calves presses
exercises.rest: For each set perform 20 strict reps followed immediately by 20 bouncing reps, and then rest 1 minute between sets

days.title: Arms And Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Cable curls
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT: You'll perform each of 4 exercises for 15 reps without resting (cable curls, alternating dumbbell curls, plate hammer curls, barbell curls). After you complete all 4 rest for 2-3 minutes before the next circuit

exercises.name: Triceps cable extensions
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT: You'll perform each of 5 exercises for 15 reps without resting (triceps cable extensions, overhead rope extensions, incline barbell extensions, bench dips, close-grip pushups). After you complete all 5 exercises rest for 2-3 minutes before the next circuit

exercises.name: Banded leg raises
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform a set of banded leg raises followed immediately by pike sit-ups with a bar; then rest for 1 minute between supersets

exercises.name: Pike sit-ups with a bar or stick
Crossover V-ups
exercises.rest: Alternate sides for a total of 30 reps

exercises.name: Bicycle crunches
exercises.rest: Alternate sides for a total of 30 reps

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: It's around this point where you really start noticing your results. You've following this program for 34 days, and you've been cutting calories and eating healthy throughout. In addition, you've been burning quite a few calories through your cardio every day.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: This is precisely the result you want to see after your reevaluation at the end of Week Four. Just stay on track with your weight training, cardio, and supplementation. I'll be taking up both the cardio and weight-training intensity next week so you'll naturally be burning more calories, and you'll potentially be adding muscle mass, which also helps burns calories to support fat loss.

days.title: Legs And Calves
days.cardio: Today begins with another upshift in cardio. Today, you'll perform a total of 40 minutes during both your morning and later-in-the-day sessions. So, this week you'll perform a total of 80 minutes of cardio a day. Morning and later cardio sessions are identical this week. Here's what you'll do:

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT: Perform leg extensions followed immediately by weighted walking lunges and then immediately by leg presses, ending with machine squats. Rest for 2-3 minutes between each of the 3 circuits

exercises.name: Machine Squats
exercises.rest: Or Smith machine squats, whichever you prefer

exercises.name: Lying Hamstrings Curls
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Standing Calves Raises
exercises.rest: Perform 20 with strict form, and then do 10 more fast. Rest 1 minute between each of these 3 sets

days.title: Back And Abs
days.cardio: Then we'll transition to an abs-and-cardio superset. This begins with partner-assisted medicine ball sit-ups. Take a look at today's video to see how this move works. If you don't have a partner, then you can perform a solo move such as plate or medicine ball sit-ups.

exercises.name: Wide-grip lats pulldowns
exercises.rest: GIANT SET: Perform wide-grip lats pulldowns followed immediately by bent-over dumbbell rows, and then immediately by close-grip cable rows. Then rest for 2 minutes between giant sets

exercises.name: Reverse-Grip Pulldowns
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform reverse-grip pulldowns followed immediately by dumbbell deadlifts, then rest for 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Partner-Assisted Medicine Ball Sit-Ups
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: For this superset perform sit-ups followed immediately by a 2-minute HIIT session. Do not rest throughout the abs-and-cardio superset

days.title: Chest
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Smith Machine Bench Presses
exercises.rest: OPTION 1: Perform Smith machine bench presses. Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Presses
exercises.rest: OPTION 2: Perform incline barbell presses. Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Presses
exercises.rest: OPTION 1: Perform incline dumbbell presses if your first move was Smith machine bench presses. Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Flat Dumbbell Presses
exercises.rest: OPTION 2: Perform flat dumbbell presses if your first move was incline barbell presses. Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Decline Dumbbell Presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform dumbbell presses followed immediately by high cable crossovers. Then rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Pec Deck Flyes
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform pec deck flyes followed immediately by bear crawls with 10 steps per side forward and 10 steps per side back. Rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Bear Crawls
exercises.reps: 10 per side forward + 10 per side back

days.title: Shoulders And Abs
days.cardio: Today's workout includes a circuit of 5 moves. You'll not only target each head of your delts, but you'll also include a compound move to hit all of them, and you'll cap it off with a HIIT session of cardio. I've built the moves in this order for this circuit: seated lateral raises to hit side delts; seated shoulder pressed to work all 3 heads of the delts; seated rear-delts raises to work posterior delts; then standing front cable raises to work anterior delts.

exercises.name: Seated Lateral Raises
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT: Perform 1 set of all 5 moves (seated lateral raises, seated shoulder presses, seated rear-delts raises, standing cable front raises and cardio) in succession without rest, and then rest 2 minutes before the next circuit.

exercises.name: Standing Barbell Presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform standing barbell presses followed immediately by standing cable face pulls, and then rest for 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Banded Crunches
exercises.rest: Rest 1 minute between sets

exercises.name: Sit-Ups
exercises.rest: GIANT SET: Perform sit-ups followed immediately by lying leg raises, then by plank to failure. Rest 1 minute between giant sets

days.title: Arms And Calves
days.cardio: Today, you'll be performing 2 giant sets for arms that also incorporate HIIT cardio, followed by 2 supersets that don't include cardio. For that reason it's important that you get in your first cardio session a few hours before your workout and your second cardio session a few hours after your workout. However, if you weight train upon rising, you can do that first, and then perform your first full cardio session after today's workout or a few hours later, and then make sure to get in your second cardio session several hours after that.

exercises.name: EZ-Bar Cable Curls
exercises.rest: GIANT SET: Perform a set of EZ-bar cable curls followed immediately by overhead rope extensions. Then perform a 1-minute session of HIIT step-ups cardio. Do not rest throughout this entire giant set

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Curls
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform seated dumbbell curls followed immediately by overhead dumbbell extensions. For the last 2 supersets include a drop set for each move. Rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Seated Calves Raises
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform seated calves presses with strict control and then go to failure with strict control for standing calves raises performed on the back of the seated calves raise machine. Rest 1 minute between supersets

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Today, you'll complete your 2 sessions of cardio as we have all week. Remember it's 20 minutes of steady-state cardio followed by 10 minutes of HIIT for 60-second intervals, and then finish off with 10 more minutes of steady-state cardio. As with most weekends, I recommend that you try to get outdoors and shift things up for one or both sessions. Just remember that you do need to perform 2 sessions, and they should be separated by several hours to keep your metabolism revving.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: At the end of the day today, you will have officially completed half of your 12-Week Lean Muscle Program . That in itself is an amazing achievement, but the harder work is ahead. Today you'll perform your weekly reevaluation in addition to performing the 2 cardio sessions as outlined in the workout chart-the same as you've done throughout Week Six.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: This week, you'll take your cardio up another notch. You'll perform 2 sessions of 50 minutes each. Both will have the same rhythm: You'll perform 40 minutes of steady-state followed immediately by 10 minutes of HIIT, but for this workout your HIIT sessions will be 30 seconds on/30 seconds off for a total of 10 HIIT sessions in those 10 minutes at the end each cardio session.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.rest: GIANT SET 1: Perform a set of leg extensions, goblet squats and stationary overhead lunges without resting, and then rest for 2 minutes before your next giant set

exercises.name: Lying Hamstrings Curls
exercises.rest: Or Smith machine squats, whichever you prefer

exercises.name: Machine Squats Or Leg Presses
exercises.rest: Choose your preferred move. Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Crunches
exercises.rest: Perform 20 slow reps followed by 10 fast reps

exercises.name: Elbow-To-Knee Twists
exercises.rest: Perform 20 reps to one side, and then perform 20 reps to the other. Finish off with 20 fast reps per side

exercises.name: Opposite Hand To Foot V-Ups
exercises.rest: Alternate sides, completing 10 reps to each leg, and then burnout with regular V-ups

days.title: Back And Traps
days.cardio: Throughout this week, you'll perform 2 sessions of cardio for 50 minutes. Each session begins with 40 minutes of steady state, followed by 10 minutes of HIIT for 30 seconds on/30 seconds of recovery. I'm not doing this to repeat myself-I'm doing it to emphasize the importance of these cardio sessions. I can't tell you how many of my clients "forget" to perform a cardio session if I don't mention it specifically. So don't be that client-complete all of your cardio as I've dictated.

exercises.name: Neutral-grip lat pulldowns
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT: Perform 1 set of each of the 4 moves of this circuit (neutral-grip lat pulldowns, cable rows, dumbbell deadlifts and kettlebell swings) without rest. Perform as many kettlebell swings as you can in 1 minute. Continue into the next circuit without resting

exercises.name: Unilateral high rows
exercises.rest: GIANT SET: You'll perform 1 set of each of these 3 exercises in each giant set. The moves: unilateral high rows, shrugs, and step-ups should be performed without resting. Also do not rest between giant sets

exercises.name: Smith machine inverted pull-ups
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform Smith machine inverted pull-ups followed immediately by a set of combat ropes. Do not rest between or at any point during these 3 super sets

days.title: Chest
days.cardio: Follow up this superset with tire sledgehammers if that move is available in your gym. If not, the key is to find a type of cardio that incorporates your upper body into HIIT cardio for 1-minute on and 1-minute off for 3 sets. You can use a rower or bear crawls if you don't have this option.

exercises.name: Flat-Bench Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.rest: SUPERSET 1: Perform flat-bench dumbbell flyes followed by pushups (to failure) and then rest 1 minute between supersets

exercises.name: Tire Sledgehammers
exercises.rest: Rest 1 minute between each 1-minute set

exercises.name: Dumbbell Presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET 2: Perform a set of dumbbell presses followed immediately by 1 minute of sled pushes. Do not rest during or after the super set

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Flyes
exercises.reps: 15 Reps SUPERSET 3: Perform a set of incline dumbbell flyes followed immediately by 1 minute of the running set explained in the video. Do not rest during or after the super set

exercises.name: Side Running + Back And Forth Running
Standing Cable Crossovers
exercises.rest: Perform one regular set followed by a set with 1 drop, and then for the last set include 2 drops for 8 reps each

days.title: Shoulders And Abs
days.cardio: Today we're going to focus on weights moves without cardio intervals included in multi-move sets. We've used that technique earlier this week, but we have used that technique enough for this week. We'll come back to it after Kai and Danielle have had a chance to recover from that specific type of intensity.

exercises.name: Standing Front Raise/Side Raise Combo
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform a set of the standing front raise/side raise combo followed immediately by dumbbell lateral raises. Rest 2 minutes between supersets, and include 5 negatives for both moves

exercises.name: Dumbbell Rear-Delts Raises
exercises.reps: 10+10 Reps Perform 10 reps on an incline bench and then stand and complete 10 more reps. Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Plate Front Raises
exercises.rest: Perform 10 reps seated and then stand and complete 10 more reps. Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Seated Barbell Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Banded Standing Shoulder Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 1 minute between sets

days.title: Arms And Calves
days.cardio: And that's a wrap for Week Seven's weight training. Don't forget you have a lot on your to-do list for the weekend, including double sessions of cardio, calorie cutting and your 16-hour intermittent fast.

exercises.name: Cable Curls
exercises.rest: SUPERSET 1: Perform a set of cable biceps curls followed immediately by rope triceps extensions. Rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Overhead Triceps Extensions
exercises.rest: SUPERSET 2: Perform a set of overhead triceps extensions followed immediately by barbell curls. Rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Seated Calves Raises + Standing Calves Burnouts
exercises.rest: After 20 reps, go to failure with seated calves raises. Then stand and perform standing calves raises to failure

days.title: Day 6
days.cardio: Today, you'll complete your 2 sessions of cardio as we have all week. Remember it's 40 minutes of steady-state cardio followed by 10 minutes of HIIT for 30-seconds on and 30 seconds off. As with most weekends, I recommend that you try to get outdoors and shift things up for one or both sessions. Just remember that you do need to perform 2 sessions, and they should be separated by several hours to keep your metabolism revving.

days.title: Day 7
days.cardio: Today you'll perform your weekly reevaluation in addition to performing the 2 cardio sessions as outlined in the workout chart-the same as you've done throughout Week Seven. You'll also weigh yourself and make certain that the program is continuing to work for you.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: And don't forget about your cardio! Today you'll perform 2 sessions of steady-state cardio that last 60 minutes each. And you'll do that every day throughout Week 8. However, I want you to split up these 60-minute sessions by performing 45 minutes on one type of cardio equipment and the last 15 minutes on another. For instance, a good choice is to perform 45 minutes on an elliptical trainer followed by 15 minutes on a Stepmill® or other type of stair machine. You can also include treadmill, jump rope or any other type of steady-state cardio you choose.

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT 1: Perform leg extensions, lying hamstrings curls, glutes/hams raises and bear crawls with no rest. Then go immediately into the next circuit without resting

exercises.name: Bear Crawls
exercises.reps: 10 per side forward and 10 per side back

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT 2: For this circuit, you'll perform squats, followed immediately by walking lunges, and then standing calves raises and abs rollers. You'll rest for 2 minutes between each of these circuits

exercises.name: Leg Press Calves Raises
exercises.rest: GIANT SET: You'll perform leg extension calves raises, followed immediately by goblet squats, and conclude with medicine ball sit-ups. No rest until you've completed the entire giant set

days.title: Back
days.cardio: Then you'll do the same with lat pulldowns, going with 10-15 reps per set. You can perform these on a machine or with a cable. So this workout begins with more traditional bodybuilding moves without the increased cardiovascular intensity of cardio moves, as we've been incorporating. Variety makes everything better, including muscle growth and fat loss. Today's workout targets muscle growth.

exercises.name: Bent-Over Rows
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Lat Pulldowns
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Reverse-Grip Pulldowns
exercises.rest: SUPERSET 1: Perform a set of reverse-grip pulldowns followed immediately by dumbbell pullovers. Rest 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Seated Cable Rows
exercises.rest: SUPERSET 2: Perform a set of seated cable rows followed immediately by dumbbell deadlifts. Rest 2 minutes between supersets

days.title: Chest
days.cardio: We aren't going to shake things up that much from yesterday's emphasis on traditional bodybuilding moves: You'll be training chest with a heavy compound movements. Other than your 2 cardio sessions, you'll only focus on chest today in your training.

exercises.name: Smith Machine Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Incline Plate Presses
exercises.rest: SUPERSET: Perform incline plate presses followed immediately by pushups to failure. Then rest for 2 minutes between supersets

exercises.name: Incline Cable Flyes
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

exercises.name: Decline Dumbbell Presses
exercises.rest: Rest 2 minutes between sets

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Rear-Delts Dumbbell Raises
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT: This 5-move circuit includes rear-delts dumbbell raises, cable upright rows, TRX rear-delts raises, Arnold presses and kettlebell swings. Perform all moves with no rest between exercises or circuits

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raises
exercises.rest: GIANT SET 1: Perform dumbbell lateral raises, followed immediately by cable front raises and then burpees with no rest. Also, do not rest between giant sets

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Next up is your triceps circuit. This one includes 4 weight exercises followed by tire sledgehammers. We're applying the same philosophy-take this small target muscle group to failure, include some intense cardio, and then hit the muscle again. You'll, in effect, perform a total of 15 sets with no rest.

exercises.name: Standing cable curls
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT 1: This 6-move circuit includes standing cable curls, standing dumbbell curls, standing barbell curls, standing hammer curls, standing barbell drag curls and weighted sled pushes and pulls. Complete all moves with no rest, and go immediately into the next circuit

exercises.name: Triceps Cable Pushdowns
exercises.reps: CIRCUIT 2: This 5-move circuit includes triceps cable pushdowns, incline barbell extensions, bench dips, cable overhead rope extensions and tire sledgehammers. Complete all moves with no rest, and go immediately into the next circuit

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Congratulations on completing your Week Eight of weight-training workouts on my 12-Week Lean Muscle Program . You're almost two-thirds of the way through this program, and you're entering the home stretch. The weight training will continue to get more intense, as will the dieting and cardio. By this time, though, I'm confident that you've developed the disciplinary tools necessary to get you through challenging phases that arise from day to day.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Here's what else you need to do today in addition to your 2 cardio sessions, as described in today's chart:

days.title: Legs, Calves & Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Leg Extensions
exercises.rest: Circuit: Leg Extensions, Goblet Squats, Walking Lunges, Box Jumps.

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.rest: Giant Set: Squats, Lying Hamstring Curls, Frog Jumps

days.title: Back
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Shrugs
exercises.rest: Minimize your leg bounce on these so that you fully target your traps

days.title: Chest
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Cable Crossovers
exercises.rest: Circuit: Cable Crossovers, Incline Flyes, Single Arm Kettlebell Swings, (Regular) Kettlebell Swings

exercises.name: Decline Flyes
exercises.rest: Circuit: Decline Flyes, Push Ups, Skaters

days.title: Shoulders
days.cardio: Remember that you should be doing your two cardio sessions every day, morning and evening. To get the most out of this trainer, it's imperative that you do all your cardio sessions. This week's cardio has been straight forward, 2 sessions of 60-minute steady state cardio each day.

exercises.name: Reverse Pec Deck
exercises.rest: Giant Set: Reverse Pec Deck, Rear Delt Dumbbell Raises, Dumbbell Front Raises

exercises.name: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Presses
exercises.reps: Giant Set 2: Seated Dumbbell Shoulder Presses, Standing Lateral Raises, Cable Front Raises

days.title: Arms, Calves & Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Incline Barbell Curls
exercises.rest: CIRCUIT 1: Incline Barbell Curls, Standing Unilateral Bicep Curls, Seated Cable Curl, Burpees

exercises.name: Alternate Dumbbell Curls
exercises.rest: Circuit 2: Alternate Dumbbell Curls, Barbell Preacher Curls, Standing Dumbbell Hammer Curls, Bear Crawls

exercises.name: Skull Crushers
exercises.rest: Superset 1: Skull Crushers, Dumbbell Kickbacks

exercises.name: Seated Calf Press
exercises.rest: Superset 2: Seated Calf Press, Lying Leg Raises

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Remember that even though today is a recovery day, you'll still be performing 2 cardio sessions as active recovery to get blood flowing to your muscles and keep your metabolic furnace burning high. You'll also start a 16 hour fast after you last meal of the day today.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: I want you to weigh yourself and adjust accordingly. You'll be doing 2 cardio sessions today as well, make sure you separate them at least 7 hours apart and try to do at least one of them outside. Doing at least one of your cardio sessions outside will help break up the monotony of doing long duration cardio in the same gym day in and day out and allow you to get some healthy restorative red light from the sun instead of the artificial bluer light in the gym.

days.title: Dtp Legs & Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Squats
exercises.rest: For this exercise go from 50 reps on your first set all the way down to 10 reps for your 5 th set.

exercises.name: Weighted Lunges
exercises.rest: Giant Set: Weighted Lunges, Hanging Leg Raises, Planks

days.title: Dtp Back & Calves
days.cardio: Cardio

days.title: Dtp Chest
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Chest Press
exercises.rest: Start with 50 reps for your 1 st set and finish with 10 reps on your 5 th set

days.title: Dtp Shoulders & Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Seated Barbell Military Press
exercises.rest: Start with 50 reps for your 1 st set and finish with 10 reps on your 5 th set

exercises.name: Oblique Twist with Medicine Ball
exercises.rest: Superset: Oblique Twist with Medicine Ball, Sit-Ups

exercises.name: Knee Tucks on Ball
exercises.rest: Superset: Knee Tucks on Medicine Ball, Plank on Medicine Ball

days.title: Dtp Arms & Calves
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Cable Curls
exercises.rest: Superset: Cable Curls, Triceps Rope Extension

exercises.name: Standing Barbell Curls
exercises.rest: Superset 2: Standing Barbell Curls, Overhead Triceps Extension

days.title: Active Rest
days.cardio: Today is an active rest day, you'll do two sessions of cardio separated by seven hours at minimum. You'll also start your 16 hour fast after your last meal today.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Today you'll weigh yourself to reevaluate your progress and you'll perform two sessions of steady state cardio separated by at least seven hours.

days.title: Dtp Legs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Wide Stance Squats
exercises.rest: For this exercise go from 50 reps on your first set all the way down to 10 reps for your 5 th set.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Bent Over Barbell RowsReverse Grip Bent Over Rows
exercises.rest: We'll do these as free-standing barbell rows and finish up the final sets on the smith machine

exercises.name: Seated Calf Raises
exercises.rest: 20 reps strict, 10 reps fast

days.title: Dtp Chest
days.cardio: Congratulations we've only got 1 ½ weeks left for the 12 Week Lean Muscle trainer . I want you to think about what you've accomplished over these past 10 ½ weeks. At this point in the trainer it's common to be obsessed with measuring food, cardio, and weekly scale readings.

days.title: Dtp Shoulders
days.cardio: Cardio

days.title: Dtp Arms
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Narrow Grip Barbell Curls
exercises.rest: Superset 1: Narrow Grip Barbell Curls, Lying Triceps Extensions

exercises.name: Wide Grip Barbell Curls
exercises.rest: Superset 2: Wide Grip Barbell Curls, Incline Triceps Extension

exercises.name: Hanging Leg Raises
exercises.rest: Superset 3: Hanging Leg Raises, Single Leg Calve Raises

days.title: Active Recovery
days.cardio: Congratulations you've made it to your active recovery day. Remember that you'll perform cardio today even though it's a recovery day. And you'll do a 16 hour fast following your last meal of the day.

days.title: | Kaged
days.cardio: Cardio

days.title: Chest, Back & Abs
days.cardio: Cardio

exercises.name: Incline Dumbbell Presses
exercises.rest: Superset 2: Incline Dumbbell Presses, Dumbbell Deadlifts

exercises.name: Sit-Ups
exercises.rest: Superset 3: Sit-Ups, Lying Leg Raises

days.title: Legs & Calves
days.cardio: Cardio

days.title: Arms
days.cardio: Don't forget to continue doing your cardio this week. You should be doing 2 sessions of 60-minute steady-state cardio separated by at least 7 hours minimum.

exercises.name: Triceps Rope Extension
exercises.rest: Superset 1: Triceps Rope Extension, Alternate Dumbbell Curls

exercises.name: Rope Curls
exercises.rest: Superset 2: Rope Curls, Lying Triceps Extensions

days.title: Shoulders
days.cardio: Cardio

days.title: Finale
days.cardio: Use program guidance for cardio.
